reviews.customers_say: Customers find these pajamas comfortable and silky like satin, with one noting they're non-see through. The style features lovely prints, and the material quality receives positive feedback, with one customer mentioning it washes well. They appreciate the fit, with one noting the pleating makes it roomy, and find them thick enough to keep warm while being cool. While some the size is perfect, others mention they run

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and comfortable pajamas
items.body: Nice pretty and warm , yet not heavy pj’s. The material is soft and the fit was great, but I am short so they are long on me( wish they were offered in petite), but they are the kind of pajama you could hang out in all day if you’d like to. The fit otherwise was good.. The quality just as nice as those expensive brands. I expect to use these for many years. Read more
items.author: Love to shop

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, Cool, Lovely
items.body: This is my third pair of these, and I LOVE them! My old ones are 2+ years old and finally looking a bit dingey (lol, I'll still wear them) so I bought these beauties to trade off into on laundry day. The print on all of them is lovely, and the material is SO soft. I love it that the neckline is nice and wide (whoever thought crew-necks were a good idea on pajamas, anyway?) and the waistband is nice and stretchy. They also don't shrink, so buy your usual size. The mediums I bought by mistake the first time are still baggy (and still comfy). The most important thing to me, though, is that they are cool to sleep in. In the winter, I want lightweight pajamas and a whole PILE of covers -- and we're almost there! Read more
items.author: Sheri S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty fabric, soft and comfortable.
items.body: Thrilled with these long sleeve pajamas that are perfect for cooler nights. Soft, comfortable fabric and a good fit. Looks just like those pictured on the web site. Washed well, and I then ordered a black pair as well. Very pleased. Great value. Read more
items.author: Bette

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable & Cute
items.body: I find this pajama set very comfortable to wear and bought a second one. The fabric is not hot or clingy. I hate pajamas that bunch up around my knees or get all twisted when I roll over so I bought a size XL (normally size 14 US) for a little extra room to move. The fit is perfect for me. I have not had to wake up to adjust them at all. I think I can say they are the most comfortable pajamas I have. My only complaint (knocking off one star) is that the pockets, which I really like, seem like they are sewn in backwards so that they naturally lay pointing to the rear instead of the front where your hands would normally rest. Read more
items.author: Tucson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute comfy lounge wear
items.body: I love these Jammie’s So comfy and the fabric is silky soft. Great colors and designs. The pants are fairly long. Light weight but keep me warm. Great value Read more
items.author: Jenn L.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and cute pajamas..
items.body: These are a hit for my mom! Love the color, material is perfect, not heavy but nice and cozy. Bought 2 pair, she loves them! Fit as expected. Read more
items.author: J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort
items.body: These pjs are so comfortable. They wash beautiful too. Fabric is great, so soft, keeps you warm but not too hot. I bought a second pair. I’m 5’3, 172 lbs and the xl fit great. I have the summer ones they make too. You will not be disappointed. I never write a review but these are the best! I got the pink /grey with butterfly’s and blue with dots. I had ordered a different one and it had a funky color that wasn’t on the picture. Read more
items.author: Linda Nichols

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING!
items.body: Most comfortable set of pajamas I have ever worn, soft, lightweight beautiful print. I think I would buy a set and every color highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Kathy Garrett

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Small White Flowers-navy, Pink Flower-white, Dark Grey, Purple Red, Army Green, Black, Colorful Polka Dot-grey, Black/Red Plaid, Star Grey, Floral Khaki-black, Floral Blue-green, Red Plaid, Sailboat-blue, Colorful Butterfly-green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
